headline.print_headline: NYPD Surveillance of Political Activism Questioned
headline.main: NYPD Surveillance of Political Activism Questioned

docs.snippet: Political activists asked a new inspector general for the New York Police Department on Tuesday to force police officials to fully disclose details about how undercover officers sought to secretly infiltrate and monitor liberal activist groups....
docs.lead_paragraph: Political activists asked a new inspector general for the New York Police Department on Tuesday to force police officials to fully disclose details about how undercover officers sought to secretly infiltrate and monitor liberal activist groups.

headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Shows Changing Al Qaeda Threat
headline.main: Boko Haram Shows Changing Al Qaeda Threat

docs.snippet: The kidnapping of more than 200 Nigerian schoolgirls last month has sparked global outrage, launched an international manhunt and instantly turned an obscure West African militant group into a household name in the Un...
docs.lead_paragraph: The kidnapping of more than 200 Nigerian schoolgirls last month has sparked global outrage, launched an international manhunt and instantly turned an obscure West African militant group into a household name in the United States. And it has raised a central question: Does the rapidly growing number of al Qaeda splinter groups pose as much of a threat as al Qaeda itself?

headline.print_headline: Four Dead in Suspected California Murder-Suicide
headline.main: Four Dead in Suspected California Murder-Suicide

docs.snippet: The bodies of four people were found at a home in suburban Southern California on Tuesday in a suspected murder-suicide, law enforcement officials said....

headline.print_headline: Nearly 400 Million Twitter Users Estimated by 2018: Study
headline.main: Nearly 400 Million Twitter Users Estimated by 2018: Study

docs.snippet: Twitter Inc's messaging service will have close to 400 million global users by 2018, mostly in Asia, Latin American and the Middle East, consulting firm eMarketer estimated on Tuesday, far short of the 1 billion once expected....
docs.lead_paragraph: Twitter Inc's messaging service will have close to 400 million global users by 2018, mostly in Asia, Latin American and the Middle East, consulting firm eMarketer estimated on Tuesday, far short of the 1 billion once expected.

headline.print_headline: Libyan Militant Leader Warns U.S. Against Interference
headline.main: Libyan Militant Leader Warns U.S. Against Interference

docs.snippet: The leader of Libya's Ansar al-sharia militant group in Benghazi warned the United States on Tuesday against interfering in the country's crisis or face worse than their conflicts in Somalia, Iraq, or Afghanistan....
docs.lead_paragraph: The leader of Libya's Ansar al-sharia militant group in Benghazi warned the United States on Tuesday against interfering in the country's crisis or face worse than their conflicts in Somalia, Iraq, or Afghanistan.
